allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(frontend): Add comprehensive CRM React Query hooks and Kanban view

- Add ~40+ missing React Query hooks for full CRM backend coverage:
  - Opportunity: update, delete, move stage
  - Pipeline: CRUD, activate, deactivate, set default, stage management
  - Campaign: CRUD, lifecycle (start, pause, complete), member management
  - Segment: CRUD, activate, deactivate, member and criteria management

- Add Kanban board view to Opportunities page:
  - Pipeline-based column layout with stages
  - Won/Lost columns for closed opportunities
  - View toggle between Kanban and Grid modes
  - Stage totals with count and amount display

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"`)

Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "cat /data/coolify/proxy/dynamic/stocker-wildcard.yml && echo ''---SEPARATOR---'' && cat /data/coolify/proxy/dynamic/coolify.yaml && echo ''---SEPARATOR---'' && docker ps --format ''{{.Names}}'' | grep -i api")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor\(identity\): Comprehensive security and code quality improvements

Security fixes:
- Upgrade PBKDF2 iterations to 600,000 \(OWASP 2023 recommendation\)
- Add backward compatibility for legacy 10,000 iteration hashes
- Remove sensitive password logging from PasswordService
- Replace Console.WriteLine with structured logging in DI registration
- Add constant-time comparison for password verification

Code cleanup:
- Remove redundant wrapper classes \(ApplicationPasswordServiceWrapper, 
  ApplicationPasswordValidatorWrapper\)
- Delete RefactoredAuthenticationService, consolidate into AuthenticationService
- Fix Turkish character encoding issues in error messages

New features:
- Add IdentityLogEvents.cs for structured logging with event IDs
- Implement missing IAuthenticationService methods:
  - GenerateAuthResponseForMasterUserAsync
  - ValidateTokenAsync
- Add comprehensive XML documentation to public interfaces

Architecture:
- Standardize interface implementations across Application/Identity layers
- Improve DI registration with proper scoping and logging
- Add GetHashingInfo method for debugging hash algorithm detection

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(sales\): Add After-Sales entities backend infrastructure

Add complete CQRS backend for AdvancePayment, CreditNote, ServiceOrder, and Warranty entities:

DTOs:
- AdvancePaymentDto, AdvancePaymentListDto with statistics
- CreditNoteDto, CreditNoteItemDto, CreditNoteListDto with statistics  
- ServiceOrderDto, ServiceOrderItemDto, ServiceOrderNoteDto, ServiceOrderListDto
- WarrantyDto, WarrantyClaimDto, WarrantyListDto with statistics

Features \(CQRS\):
- Queries: GetAll, GetById, GetByCustomer, GetStatistics for each entity
- Commands: Create, Update, Delete and status management operations
- Handlers: MediatR handlers with ITenantService for multi-tenancy

API Controllers:
- AdvancePaymentsController: /api/sales/advance-payments
- CreditNotesController: /api/sales/credit-notes
- ServiceOrdersController: /api/sales/service-orders
- WarrantiesController: /api/sales/warranties

Infrastructure:
- Updated SalesDbContext with new DbSets
- Added multi-tenancy query filters
- Created EF migration: AddAfterSalesEntities

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
